Introduction
This topic contains information on eligibility requests for the Polish and Czechoslovakian Armed Forces, including
statutoryÂ basis for eligibility

title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section G - Eligibility for Medical Services for Polish and Czechoslovakian Armed Forces
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section G
